sentences.sContent: The advent of the computer has brought this sort of task within the bounds of possibility.
sentences.sCn: 电脑的出现使这种任务的完成成为可能。

synos.tran: 到来；出现；基督降临；基督降临节

phrases.pCn: (重要人物或事件)…的出现(或到来)

remMethod.val: ad + vent(来) → 到来， 来临； 出现

trans.tranCn: 到来， 来临； 出现
trans.tranOther: Theadventof an important event, invention, or situation is the fact of it starting or coming into existence
